attributes.action: Guarantee that Milton Keynes has access to Digital TV, without the use of a satellite before Digital Switchover.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At the moment Milton Keynes, has no terrestrial broadcast system, all TV is received either by Satellite or old Analog cable system. When Digital Switchover occurs, those of use who cannot install a satellite receiver will no longer have access to any form of TV.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
